title: Billing Dispute - Incorrect Meter Read
description: A customer believes their bill is wrong because the meter read was estimated, not actual.

tasks.description: Retrieve the customer's bill and confirm that the read type was 'Estimated'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies the bill was based on an estimate.

tasks.description: Ask the customer to provide a current, actual meter read.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent guides the customer on how to read their meter and records the value.

tasks.description: Re-bill the account using the actual meter read provided by the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent cancels the old bill and issues a new, corrected bill, resolving the dispute.
